QuestData.Title: Tortoise Mastery
QuestData.Description: Granted, tortoises are not big game but they can be mean game. They also work as the perfect bait for bigger game!$b$bGotcher found some ol' tablets sayin' that the Torjari Pit is a sacrificin' site. The old empire used ta' feed unruly sorts to the waters as it were.$b$bWell ah mean to see me what's down in that water. Gather up some fresh tortoise shells and meet me at the pit.$b$bLet's see if ol' legends be true.
QuestData.CompletionText: I've always been livin' in me father's shadow. But after today, folks are gonna remember the name of Nesingwary, Jr.!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank ye. This one aught ta' one up me pop.
